languages.text: {n}В голосе образуется тяжелый механический лязг.{/n} "Мы умоляли его одуматься, и он покарал нас, лишив разума". {n}Речь теней становится мягче, женственнее.{/n} "Но мы все равно были верны ему, пытались его спасти, хотя он не спас нас..." {n}Голос выстывает, в нем звучит иномировая печаль:{/n} "Он — виновен".

{n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе образуется тяжелый механический лязг.{/n} "Мы умоляли его одуматься, и он покарал нас, лишив разума". {n}Речь теней становится мягче, женственнее.{/n} "Но мы все равно были верны ему, пытались его спасти, хотя он не спас нас..." {n}Голос выстывает, в нем звучит иномировая печаль:{/n} "Он — виновен".

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang.{/n} "We begged them to reconsider but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine.{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice grows cold. Sorrow from beyond this world resonates in it.{/n} "He is guilty."

We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice grows cold. Sorrow from beyond this world resonates in it.{/n} "He is guilty."

We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice grows cold. Sorrow from beyond this world resonates in it.{/n} "He is guilty."

We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice grows cold. Sorrow from beyond this world resonates in it.{/n} "He is guilty."

We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

{n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

languages.text: {n}La voz se vuelve pesada y adquiere un eco metálico.{/n} «Le rogamos que lo reconsiderara, pero nos arrebató la mente como castigo». {n}El tono de las sombras es ahora más amable y femenino.{/n} «Pero le seguíamos siendo leales. Intentamos salvarle, aunque él no nos había salvado a nosotros...». {n}La voz pasa a ser fría y resuena con un dolor de otro mundo:{/n} «Es culpable».
languages.original_text: {n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz se vuelve pesada y adquiere un eco metálico.{/n} «Le rogamos que lo reconsiderara, pero nos arrebató la mente como castigo». {n}El tono de las sombras es ahora más amable y femenino.{/n} «Pero le seguíamos siendo leales. Intentamos salvarle, aunque él no nos había salvado a nosotros...». {n}La voz pasa a ser fría y resuena con un dolor de otro mundo:{/n} «Es culpable».

languages.text: {n}金属音も重なって、声が重くなる。{/n}「私たちは考え直すよう頼み込んだのに、その男は罰として私たちの命を奪った」{n}影の話し方は優しく、女性らしく変わった。{/n}「それでも、私たちはその男に忠誠を誓ったわ。そいつが私たちを救ってくれなくても、私たちはそいつを救おうとした…」{n}声は冷たくなり、この世のものとは思えない悲しい声が響く。{/n}「その男は有罪だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}金属音も重なって、声が重くなる。{/n}「私たちは考え直すよう頼み込んだのに、その男は罰として私たちの命を奪った」{n}影の話し方は優しく、女性らしく変わった。{/n}「それでも、私たちはその男に忠誠を誓ったわ。そいつが私たちを救ってくれなくても、私たちはそいつを救おうとした…」{n}声は冷たくなり、この世のものとは思えない悲しい声が響く。{/n}「その男は有罪だ」

languages.text: {n}声音变得沉重起来，带着金属般的铿锵声。{/n}“我们祈求他重新考虑，可他却惩罚了我们，夺走了我们的思维。”{n}阴影中的声音变得更加温柔，更加女性化。{/n}“但无论如何，我们始终对他忠心耿耿。我们试着拯救他的生命，尽管他并没有拯救我们……”{n}声音随即变得冰冷，宛如来自另一个世界的悲伤回响。{/n}“他有罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}声音变得沉重起来，带着金属般的铿锵声。{/n}“我们祈求他重新考虑，可他却惩罚了我们，夺走了我们的思维。”{n}阴影中的声音变得更加温柔，更加女性化。{/n}“但无论如何，我们始终对他忠心耿耿。我们试着拯救他的生命，尽管他并没有拯救我们……”{n}声音随即变得冰冷，宛如来自另一个世界的悲伤回响。{/n}“他有罪。”

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme wird schwer und nimmt einem metallischen Klang an:{/n} "Wir haben ihn angefleht, es sich anders zu überlegen, doch er hat uns als Strafe den Verstand geraubt." {n}Die Stimme der Schatten ist jetzt sanfter und weiblicher:{/n} "Doch wir sind ihm dennoch treu geblieben. Wir haben versucht, ihn zu retten, obwohl er uns nicht gerettet hatte ..." {n}Die Stimme wird kalt, voller Trauer, die nicht aus dieser Welt stammt:{/n} "Er ist schuldig."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme wird schwer und nimmt einem metallischen Klang an:{/n} "Wir haben ihn angefleht, es sich anders zu überlegen, doch er hat uns als Strafe den Verstand geraubt." {n}Die Stimme der Schatten ist jetzt sanfter und weiblicher:{/n} "Doch wir sind ihm dennoch treu geblieben. Wir haben versucht, ihn zu retten, obwohl er uns nicht gerettet hatte ..." {n}Die Stimme wird kalt, voller Trauer, die nicht aus dieser Welt stammt:{/n} "Er ist schuldig.

languages.text: {n}La voix se fait lourde et prend des accents métalliques :{/n} « Nous l'avons supplié de renoncer, mais il s'est emparé de nos esprits pour nous punir. » {n}Le timbre de l'ombre se radoucit et se fait plus féminin :{/n} « Mais nous lui sommes restés fidèles malgré tout. Nous avons tenté de le sauver même s'il nous avait abandonnés... » {n}La voix se fait froide et porte en elle l'écho d'un chagrin venu d'un autre monde :{/n} « Il est coupable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voice grows heavy with a metallic clang:{/n} "We begged him to reconsider, but he took our minds away as punishment." {n}The shadows' speech is now gentler and more feminine:{/n} "But we were loyal to him regardless. We tried to save him even though he had not saved us..." {n}The voice becomes cold, resonating with sorrow from beyond this world:{/n} "He is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix se fait lourde et prend des accents métalliques :{/n} « Nous l'avons supplié de renoncer, mais il s'est emparé de nos esprits pour nous punir. » {n}Le timbre de l'ombre se radoucit et se fait plus féminin :{/n} « Mais nous lui sommes restés fidèles malgré tout. Nous avons tenté de le sauver même s'il nous avait abandonnés... » {n}La voix se fait froide et porte en elle l'écho d'un chagrin venu d'un autre monde :{/n} « Il est coupable. »
